00029 #import "GHUITableViewCell.h"
00030 
00031 @implementation GHUITableViewCell
00032 
00033 @synthesize cellView=cellView_;
00034 
00035 - (id)initWithView:(UIView *)view reuseIdentifier:(NSString *)reuseIdentifier {
00036   return [self initWithView:view reuseIdentifier:reuseIdentifier target:nil accessoryAction:nil];
00037 }
00038 
00039 - (id)initWithView:(UIView *)view reuseIdentifier:(NSString *)reuseIdentifier target:(id)target accessoryAction:(SEL)accessoryAction {
00040   if ((self = [super initWithFrame:CGRectZero reuseIdentifier:reuseIdentifier])) {
00041     
00042     self.target = target;
00043     self.accessoryAction = accessoryAction;
00044     
00045     cellView_ = [view retain];
00046     cellView_.opaque = NO; // TODO(gabe): Check if we should alter the opaque here for sure
00047     [self.contentView addSubview:cellView_];
00048     self.selectionStyle = UITableViewCellSelectionStyleGray;
00049     
00050     // Useful to set frame size to subview; So the table view delegate can use the cell frame size directly
00051     self.frame = CGRectMake(0, 0, cellView_.frame.size.width, cellView_.frame.size.height);         
00052   }
00053   return self;
00054 }
00055 
00056 - (void)setTransparentBackground {
00057   CGSize size = self.frame.size;
00058   UIView *transparentView = [[[UIView alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0, 0, size.width, size.height)] autorelease];
00059   transparentView.opaque = NO;
00060   self.backgroundView = transparentView;  
00061   [transparentView release];
00062 }
00063 
00064 - (void)layoutSubviews {
00065   CGSize size = self.frame.size;
00066   cellView_.frame = CGRectMake(0, 0, size.width, size.height);
00067 }
00068 
00069 - (CGSize)sizeThatFits:(CGSize)size {
00070   return [cellView_ sizeThatFits:size];
00071 }
00072 
00073 - (UIView *)hitTest:(CGPoint)point withEvent:(UIEvent *)event {
00074   return [cellView_ hitTest:[self convertPoint:point toView:cellView_] withEvent:event];  
00075 }
00076 
00077 - (void)dealloc {
00078   [cellView_ release];
00079   [super dealloc];
00080 }
00081 
00082 @end
